original_text: But if in his eyes the itch is unchanged and black hair has grown in it, the itch is healed and he is clean, and the priest shall pronounce him clean.
korean_text: 그러나 제사장이 보기에 옴이 여전하고 그 자리에 검은 털이 났으면 그 옴은 나았고 그 사람은 정하니 제사장은 그를 정하다 할지니라

sentences.original_text: But if in his eyes the itch is unchanged
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그의 눈에 그 부위가 변하지 않고

sentences.original_text: and black hair has grown in it
and the priest shall pronounce him clean
